attributes.action: Support Jeremy Corbyn as leader of a temporary Government
attributes.additional_details: Corbyn will seek an extension of Article 50 in order to do this, and Labour will commit itself in the election campaign to a public vote on the terms of leaving the EU, with an option to remain. Failing to support this reasonable plan is enabling a No Deal Brexit.
attributes.background: Corbyn is the Leader of the largest opposition party, with a huge mandate from Labour party members. We call on all minority parties to support his plan to form a time-limited temporary government, with the aim of calling a General Election.
